information.question_generator: In this generator you have to answer questions to generate RF. If you leave this interface all your question progress is lost and you have to start at 500RF again!
information.timing_generator: In this generator you have to click the button as soon as the Box turns green. The faster you click, the more RF you get!
information.pong_generator: In this generator you have to play Pong. For a point, win and a hit you get a different amount of RF
information.item_generator: In this generator you have to obtain a random Item to generate RF
information.death_generator: In this generator you have to kill a random Mob to generate RF
information.position_generator: In this generator you have to run to a specific location to generate RF
lore.item_generator: §3I hope u have a little bit of luck
hover.timing_generator.multiplier: Multiplier: Number between 1 and 8. Increases if you click fast enough!
hover.timing_generator.delay: Delay: Time you needed for your click
hover.timing_generator.energy_added: Energy you got for this delay
hover.position_generator.player: Player who is running to the flag
